channel.title: Help With Client! [PI]
channel.description: Ok so i am editing this client and making it webclient ready but i dont kno how to change the directorys. Like the client has the cache folder in the client folder. I would like the cache to load from the "c:" drive but dont how how to change it so please help ;D
